text: On 25 February 2022, a strong 6.2 earthquake happened in West Sumatra, Indonesia. The earthquake hit at a depth of and had an epicenter in Pasaman. At least 12 people were killed, 388 were injured and four others were missing. ==References== Category:2022 disasters in Asia Category:2020s earthquakes in Asia Category:2022 floods Category:2020s in Indonesia Category:Earthquakes in Indonesia Category:February 2022 events Category:Floods in Asia 2022 earthquake Category:2022 earthquakes
title: 2022 Sumatra earthquake
